alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 18 at 11:39PM MDT until May 19 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory period, west winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Isolated gusts up to 50 mph are possible in and around showers. The strongest winds and highest impacts in the next 24 hours will be in the overnight periods tonight. * WHERE...Butte, Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Thursday. The Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
